name: Order Feedback For WooCommerce
author: WPVibes

sections.description:
Struggling to understand your customers’ shopping experiences on your WooCommerce store? Without feedback, you could be missing out the pain points and issues they may encounter during the checkout process. Unresolved issues can lead to frustrated customers, decreased satisfaction, and lost revenue for your store.
Introducing Order Feedback for WooCommerce – your ultimate solution. With this plugin, you can easily collect and analyze feedback from your customers. By addressing their concerns promptly, you can enhance their shopping experience, boost satisfaction, foster loyalty, and drive revenue growth for your store.

Key features of Order Feedback form for WooCommerce

  • Seamless Integration: Display feedback forms effortlessly on the Thank You page/Order Received page.
  • User-Centric Approach: If users miss filling out the form on the Thank You page, it conveniently appears in their My Account section under Order Details page.
  • Easily accessible: View Feedback submissions conveniently within the Order Notes section in the WordPress admin.
  • Collapsible Feedback Form: Enjoy a clutter-free experience with our collapsible Feedback Form, ensuring easy access for users while maintaining a clean interface.

Why should you choose Order Feedback For WooCommerce?

Light Weight and Instant Loading

Code is optimized for fast loading.

Expert Support

We have a highly efficient support team that is always ready to help you. Ask for your queries in the Support Forum or contact us directly.

Regular Updates

Fully compatible with WordPress and WooCommerce latest versions.

Our other WooCommerce Extensions

✅ Frontend Product Editor: Frontend product editor can be a great addition to your WooCommerce websites since it allows you to modify the WooCommerce product information right from the frontend.
✅ Quick View Popup for WooCommerce: Quick View Popup For WooCommerce brings an array of features to enhance your WooCommerce experience, offering seamless product previews and details.
sections.installation:
1. First, ensure WooCommerce is installed and activated. If it is not installed, please install WooCommerce. Our plugin will not work without WooCommerce.
  2. Download the plugin and then Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How does Order Feedback for the WooCommerce plugin help me?

This plugin gives you a direct way for gathering valuable customer feedback. Integrating feedback forms into the order process allows you to collect insights to enhance your products, services, and overall customer experience easily. This valuable feedback nurtures continuous improvement and guides you to build stronger, more customer-centric WooCommerce store.

Where Can I get support?

For any questions, you can contact us directly through our Contact Page.

Will it work with any theme?

Yes, this plugin will work on all the themes that support WooCommerce functionality.

Do I need to know coding skills to use this WooCommerce extension?

Absolutely not; it’s an easy-to-use plugin, so no coding knowledge is needed.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Improved form styling.
  • Display feedback in separate metabox on Order edit screen in admin.

0.1

  • Initial Launch

short_description: Order Feedback For WooCommerce lets you boost customer satisfaction by providing them a feedback form to share their order experiences.

screenshots.caption: WooCommerce Order Feedback Form: Capture valuable insights from customers.
Admin View: Easily view feedback submissions under order notes in the WordPress admin.
Thank You Page Feedback Form: Collect feedback seamlessly post-order completion.
Collapsible Thank You Page Feedback Form: Streamline user experience with collapsible feedback forms.
Success Message: Feedback Form confirmation message upon submission for a smooth customer journey.
Account Page Feedback Form: Provide another avenue for customers to share feedback.
Account Page Submission Confirmation: Feedback form submission confirmation message on the Account Page
